column5: Cool and comfortable one bedroom apartment located in North Dallas, TX. Centrally located between suburban cities: Plano, Carrollton, & Addison. Approx 25 min drive to Downtown Dallas. It's the perfect location for singles or couples. It's close to bars that are within walking distance. Just 10 min down the St from Addison Entertainment strip that includes restaurants, a movie theater, a comedy club & more. The apartment includes a 55\
